channel.title: Trig
channel.description: Well when school started this year, I had originally planned to take Precalculus Honors at my school. It was too difficult for me since I only had math in 10th grade for only a semester because of the way my former school's block schedule was planned out. So I switched into trigonometry honors and it's still like a different language to me. The only other class I can switch into is Integrated Mathwhich is a step above Algebra2, so should I switch into it?

item.title: Trig
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

If you switch into it. It will be fairly easy. I’m taking pre-calculus and i’m a freshman. If its to hard you should switch out

Read full topic
